title: ðŸ” AWS IoT Dynamic Thing Groups Manager (Boto3)
learning_description:
This script provides comprehensive management of AWS IoT Dynamic Thing Groups with AWS IoT Fleet Indexing.
You can create groups with query validation, list existing groups with membership counts,
and safely delete groups. Dynamic Thing Groups automatically update membership based on real-time
device attributes, firmware versions, and shadow data using AWS IoT Fleet Indexing queries.

learning.dynamic_groups_description:
AWS IoT Dynamic Thing Groups use AWS IoT Fleet Indexing queries to automatically organize devices based
on real-time attributes. Unlike AWS IoT static Thing Groups, membership updates automatically when
device properties change. You can query AWS IoT device registry attributes (country, Thing Type),
AWS IoT Device Shadows (battery level), and AWS IoT Software Package Catalog shadows (firmware versions). This enables
sophisticated device segmentation for targeted operations and monitoring.

ðŸ”„ NEXT: We will define criteria and validate the query before creating the group
